content:
XAMPPRocky commented on Issue #1239:

As an update: Mozilla has chosen to use Matrix.

bnjbvr commented on Issue #1239:

Closing: we'll be using Zulip. See README/CONTRIBUTING. Thanks for opening an issue, though!

bnjbvr closed Issue #1239:

I'm not sure if this is the right place for this issue, but there isn't a general bytecodealliance repo. The current official platform is still Cranestation/Lobby on gitter.im. Is there plans to change the name or move to a different platform with the organisational change?

Personally the gitter clients has gotten quite poor in terms of performance and responsiveness, and I would prefer if there was a general organisation for all of the projects under the umbrella as the current gitter is mainly focused only on cranelift.
